title: Implement OAuth2 Authentication
description:
We need to support Google and GitHub login.

### Requirements
- [ ] Google Strategy
- [ ] GitHub Strategy
- [ ] JWT Session handling

See [RFC 7519](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7519) for details.

comments.author: bob
comments.text: I can handle the GitHub part.
